mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.weixiubaobei_name as weixiubaobeiName ,a.weixiubaobei_text as weixiubaobeiText ,a.weixiubaobei_types as weixiubaobeiTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.weixiubaobei_time as weixiubaobeiTime ,a.weixiubaobei_yesno_types as weixiubaobeiYesnoTypes ,a.weixiubaobei_yesno_text as weixiubaobeiYesnoText ,a.weixiubaobei_shenhe_time as weixiubaobeiShenheTime ,a.create_time as createTime
